message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $15,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $10,000 undervalues the product significantly. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This price reflects the true value and potential this product offers.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and would like to propose $12,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with the value you're seeking.
